Type declarations provided for use in Platform.Bible extensions. Essential TypeScript definitions for PAPI interactions.

Key Type Sections:

  • @papi/backend - Backend PAPI objects
  • @papi/core - Core PAPI interaction types
  • @papi/frontend - Frontend PAPI objects
  • @papi/frontend/react - React hooks for PAPI
  • papi-shared-types - Shared interface declarations

Our Mission

To create a collaborative tool for the Bible translation community to reach the nations with Scripture.


We are an open-source platform designed to bring developers and translators together for a common purpose—translating scripture for all nations and language communities. In Platform, developers create extensions using our API, and these can be offered in the Extension Marketplace in Paratext 10 Studio for
